body_html:
@gunan , Hi, I don't have specific reason why mlocate is a must. I filed this issue only because when I compiling your source, I ran across the situation that mlocate is a must of dependency.

Since I was compiling from r1.2, which in fact is the version your official API document supporting then.
And, I was compiling the source inside a docker container. The image is CentOS 7

In conclusion, no particular reason. And sorry for the late response, was quite a busy summer.

body:
@gunan , Hi, I don't have specific reason why `mlocate` is a must. I filed this issue only because when I compiling your source, I ran across the situation that `mlocate` is a must of dependency.

Since I was compiling from `r1.2`, which in fact is the version your official API document supporting then. 
And, I was compiling the source inside a docker container. The image is `CentOS 7`

In conclusion, no particular reason. And sorry for the late response, was quite a busy summer.
